text: Kamal Narain Singh (December 13, 1926 â€“ September 8, 2022) is an Indian judge. He was the 22nd Chief Justice of India from November to December 1991. He was from Allahabad. At 17 days, his tenure as chief justice is the shortest. Singh died on September 8, 2022 at the age of 95.Former CJI KN Singh passes away ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Chief justices of India
title: Kamal Narain Singh
